Articles.Content:
Hello all

Finally decided to post something on the forums (came for the challenges).

I have to say this is one of the best communities I have ever found around.

Hello poncho, and welcome to the forums!

Good to have you aboard and it's certainly nice to hear your kind words about the community. I hope you enjoy the challenges and your time in the forum in general.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the Forums!

Hope you have a great time here.

See you 'round!

YargJay9991

Thank you all for the kind welcome.

I'm facing my first challenge... How do I edit my signature?

I've been trying to find it out on my profile settings and etc, to no avail...

Now that you have three posts approved by a moderator, you should be able to edit your sig and set up an avatar.

Happy landings!

Edited October 26, 2015 by Starhawk

Hi!

Yessss!!!!! Now I can edit my sig, let's see if it works...

Hey poncho!!

Welcome to the forums! (Nice sig by the way!)

All the best.
Welcome to the forums! I was a longtime lurker as well, 2 years, kind of nice to see I'm not that abnormal!

Welcome! I too lurked for a year. But now I'm here! Hey, that rhymes! I have time! I'm a poet and you didn't know it!

Welcome aboard!
